article.title: Doing Business with the IDB
article.summary: Get links to Inter-American Development bank business opportunities, supplier guide and learn more about doing business with the IDB.
article.content:
Although the opportunities for U.S. firms are broad in sector, number, and size, taking advantage of these opportunities can be difficult and confusing for newcomers. Companies that are successful at doing business with the IDB take the time and effort to learn and network.

Learn about doing business with the Bank here: http://www.iadb.org/en/resources-for-businesses/doing-business-with-idb,%206300.html.

Please review the IDB Supplier Guide for more detailed information on doing business with the Bank.
